main event: An unidentified flying object was sighted moving at high speeds in a report involving the U.S. Air Force.
interesting points: The object was described as a brilliant red pulsating light that changed shape from circular to elliptical., The sighting was reported on June 9, 1952, at Topeka, Kansas., Witnesses included reliable members of the military and civilian observers., The object was observed for approximately 10 minutes and left no trace., Reports included details about weather conditions during the sighting, indicating clear visibility.
witness description: reliable and competent observers including military personnel
